# f5distributedcloud_enhanced_firewall_policy (Data Source)

The `f5distributedcloud_enhanced_firewall_policy` data source retrieves information about an existing enhanced firewall policy.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "f5distributedcloud_enhanced_firewall_policy" "example" {
  name      = "my-enhanced-firewall-policy"
  namespace = "my-namespace"
}

output "enabled" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_enhanced_firewall_policy.example.enabled
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the enhanced firewall policy to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the enhanced firewall policy is located.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the enhanced firewall policy.
- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the enhanced firewall policy is enabled.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the enhanced firewall policy.
